title: Hero For Hire
description: #1 Bestseller on Amazon - Historical Fantasy and Alternate History! #49 on Free Kindle E-books!Villainy in your village? Basilisks in your barnyard? Summon Eno the Thracian. Swift sword; reasonable rates.With all the famous heroes fighting the Trojan War, there's freelance work enough in an Ancient Greece where the monsters are as real as the Gods. Armed with his wits and a mysterious sword, Eno must stop the Witch-Goddess Hekate from opening the seventeen doors of Hades to release her zombie army...and find his own way out before becoming her immortal general or, even worse, her lover.
author: C.B. Pratt
